question: Which prestigious drama school did Alfred Molina attend?
expected: Guildhall School of Music and Drama

content: Question: Which prestigious drama school did Alfred Molina attend?

<python>
results = search_pages("Alfred Molina drama school")
if results:
    page_id = results[0]['page_id']
    sections = view_sections(page_id)
    for section in sections:
        content = read_section(section['section_id'])
        if "drama school" in content.lower():
            print(content)
            break

**Alfred Molina** (born **Alfredo Molina**; 24 May 1953) is an English actor and voice artist known for his work on the stage and screen. He first rose to prominence in the [End](West)(West End theatre), earning a nomination for the [Olivier Award for Best Newcomer in a Play](Laurence)(Laurence Olivier Award for Best Newcomer in a Play) for his performance in the production of *[Oklahoma!](Oklahoma!)* in 1980. He made his film debut as [Satipo](List of Indiana Jones characters#Satipo) in *[of the Lost Ark](Raiders)(Raiders of the Lost Ark)* and his [Broadway](Broadway theatre) debut as Yvan in a production of *[Art](Art (play))* from 1998 to 1999. His other Broadway roles include [Tevye](Tevye) in the musical *[on the Roof](Fiddler)(Fiddler on the Roof)* from 2004 to 2005 and [Rothko](Mark)(Mark Rothko) in the play *[Red](Red (play))* from 2009 to 2010.

On screen, his best known roles include [Halliwell](Kenneth)(Kenneth Halliwell) in *[Up Your Ears](Prick)(Prick Up Your Ears)* (1987), [Bozorg Mahmoody](Sayyed)(Sayyed Bozorg Mahmoody) in *[Without My Daughter](Not)(Not Without My Daughter (film))*, (1991), Mellersh Wilkins in *[April](Enchanted)(Enchanted April (1991 film))* (1992), Rahad Jackson in *[Nights](Boogie)(Boogie Nights)* (1997), Comte de Reynaud in *[Chocolat](Chocolat (2000 film))* (2000), [Rivera](Diego)(Diego Rivera) in *[Frida](Frida (film))* (2002), [Tetzel](Johann)(Johann Tetzel) in *[Luther](Luther (2003 film))* (2003), Bishop Aringarosa in *[Da Vinci Code](The)(The Da Vinci Code (film))* (2006), Jack Mellor in *[Education](An)(An Education)* (2009), and George in *[Is Strange](Love)(Love Is Strange (film))* (2014). He has voiced characters in *[Rango](Rango (2011 film))* (2011), *[University](Monsters)(Monsters University)* (2013), *[Race to the Edge](Dragons:)(Dragons: Race to the Edge)* (2016), *[Breaks the Internet](Ralph)(Ralph Breaks the Internet)* (2018), *[II](Frozen)(Frozen II)* (2019), and *[League of Super-Pets](DC)(DC League of Super-Pets)* (2022). He is also known for his portrayal of [Octavius / Doctor Octopus](Otto)(Otto Octavius (film character)) in [Raimi](Sam)(Sam Ra
